forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 61F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.
